channel.title: Global Construction & Infrastructure 200
channel.description: Global tracking of infrastructure, tech, and policy.

item.title: Ottawa & Quebec Sign $1B Housing Infrastructure Deal
item.description: Federal and provincial governments finalize a $1B fund for municipal water/sewer upgrades to unlock housing sites.

item.title: Hydro-Québec: Côte Saint-Luc Substation Groundbreaking
item.description: Work begins on the $740M substation project, including 18km of new underground transmission lines.

item.title: Montreal REM: Airport Station Concrete Pour Complete
item.description: CDPQ Infra confirms the final structural concrete pour for the REM Airport station terminal link.

item.title: Northvolt Six: Piling Work Resumes in Saint-Basile
item.description: After a winter pause, piling for the main cathode factory has resumed with reinforced environmental oversight.

item.title: Ontario Line: Tunnel Boring Machine 'Alice' Breaks Through
item.description: The first TBM for the Ontario Line has successfully broken through at the future Queen/Spadina station.

item.title: Build Canada Homes Launches Prefab Housing RFI
item.description: Federal government seeks industry capacity data for massive procurement of factory-built modular homes.

item.title: Quebec Construction Comm. (CCQ) Reports 4% Labor Shortage
item.description: CCQ data shows a persistent 4% deficit in certified electricians and crane operators for active industrial projects.

item.title: Trois-Rivières Hospital Expansion: $300M Contract Awarded
item.description: Pomerleau has been awarded the design-build contract for the new hospital wing, aiming for 2029 completion.

item.title: Toronto 'The Well' Project Final Inspection Passed
item.description: The massive mixed-use complex has passed final municipal safety inspections, fully opening to the public.

item.title: BC Hydro Site C: Final Turbine Installation
item.description: Crews have installed the 6th and final turbine runner at the Site C dam, keeping the project on track for full 2026 energization.

item.title: Gordie Howe Bridge: Deck Connection Ceremony
item.description: US and Canadian officials celebrated the final structural steel connection of the bridge deck.

item.title: Laval 'Carré Laval' Innovation Zone: Phase 1 Excavation
item.description: Excavation has started for the first carbon-neutral office tower in the new downtown innovation district.

item.title: Alberta Carbon Capture Line: Regulatory Approval
item.description: The Alberta Energy Regulator approved the 40km trunk line for the Pathways Alliance CCS project.

item.title: Ottawa LRT Stage 2: Trillium Line Testing Intensifies
item.description: Full-speed testing of the Stadler FLIRT trains is now occurring daily on the southern extension.

item.title: Quebec Bill 16: Building Inspection Reforms Live
item.description: New mandatory inspection schedules for facades and parking garages (5+ stories) are now in force.

item.title: Halifax Infirmary Expansion: Demolition Begins
item.description: Heavy demolition of the old parking structure marks the start of the massive acute care expansion.

item.title: Montreal Port Expansion: Contrecoeur Terminal Hearing
item.description: Final public hearings for the Contrecoeur expansion terminal concluded, with a decision expected in Q2.

item.title: Bombardier EcoJet Plant: Site Selection Shortlist
item.description: Bombardier has shortlisted Mirabel and Dorval for a potential new advanced manufacturing facility.

item.title: Saskatchewan Potash Mine Expansion Completed
item.description: Nutrien announces completion of the shaft lining phase at the Jansen Stage 1 project.

item.title: Via Rail High Frequency Rail: RFQ for Rolling Stock
item.description: Procurement launched for the specialized 200km/h trainsets required for the Quebec-Toronto corridor.

item.title: Vancouver Broadway Subway: Track Installation Begins
item.description: Crews have started laying rails in the twin tunnels between Great Northern Way and Arbutus.

item.title: Rio Tinto Fer et Titane: Decarbonization Pilot Online
item.description: New electric plasma furnaces at Sorel-Tracy are now fully operational in a world-first pilot.

item.title: Ontario Construction Act: Prompt Payment Tweaks
item.description: Revisions to dispute adjudication timelines under the Act took effect Jan 1, aimed at faster subcontractor pay.

item.title: Sherbrooke University: Quantum Institute Annex Opens
item.description: The $150M expansion dedicated to quantum computing hardware fabrication is officially open.

item.title: Windsor EV Battery Plant: Equipment Move-In
item.description: NextStar Energy has begun installing heavy electrode manufacturing equipment in the main Windsor hall.

item.title: Quebec Roads: A25 Tunnel Rehab Phase 2 Starts
item.description: Phase 2 of the major rehabilitation of the Louis-Hippolyte-La Fontaine Tunnel involves south tube closures.

item.title: Indigenous Housing Fund: $200M Allocation for North
item.description: New funding released for rapid-deploy modular housing in Nunavut and Northern Quebec.

item.title: Port of Quebec: Biomass Terminal Upgrades
item.description: Construction starts on new covered conveyor systems to reduce dust and increase wood pellet export capacity.

item.title: US Construction Robotics Market: Bedrock Raises $270M
item.description: Autonomous grading startup Bedrock Robotics secures massive Series B to scale fleet deployment.

item.title: Mexico Infrastructure Plan: $5.6T Peso Announcement
item.description: President Sheinbaum unveils a 5-year, 5.6 trillion peso plan focused on rail and water infrastructure.

item.title: Brazil-Bolivia Bridge: Construction Launch
item.description: Work begins on the 1.2km bridge over the Mamoré River, a key integration project for South America.

item.title: AIA Forecast: Data Center Spending to Jump 26%
item.description: The only "strong growth" sector in US construction for 2026 is data centers, driven by AI compute demand.

item.title: Caterpillar Launches Electric Wheel Loader 950 GC
item.description: CAT's new medium electric loader offers 8-hour runtimes, targeting urban noise-sensitive zones.

item.title: Texas: Samsung Taylor Fab 2 Topping Out
item.description: Structural steel completion celebrated at Samsung's second massive semiconductor fab in Taylor, Texas.

item.title: Peru: Chancay Port Phase 2 Study Approved
item.description: Authorities approve environmental studies for the expansion of the Chinese-built mega-port.

item.title: New York: Gateway Tunnel Boring Contracts Awarded
item.description: The Gateway Development Commission awards $4B in tunneling contracts for the Hudson River tubes.

item.title: California HSR: Central Valley Viaduct Completion
item.description: The 3-mile Cedar Viaduct in Fresno is officially complete, ready for track systems installation.

item.title: Panama Canal: Indio River Reservoir Design Shortlist
item.description: Three consortiums shortlisted to design the $2B reservoir critical for future canal water levels.

item.title: Argentina: Vaca Muerta Gas Pipeline Phase 2 Funding
item.description: Private consortium secures financing to extend the gas pipeline to the Brazilian border.

item.title: Komatsu Acquires American Battery Solutions
item.description: Komatsu vertically integrates battery production to accelerate its electric mining truck rollout.

item.title: Brazil: Ferrogrão Railway Environmental License Reinstated
item.description: The Supreme Court allows environmental licensing to proceed for the controversial grain railway.

item.title: Tesla Giga Mexico: Stamping Press Installed
item.description: First massive Giga Press components arrive at the Santa Catarina site.

item.title: Florida: Brightline Tampa Extension Route finalized
item.description: Right-of-way agreements signed for the rail extension along the I-4 corridor.

item.title: Chile: Desalination Plant 'Aguas Pacifico' 50% Complete
item.description: The $1B desalination project to supply Anglo American mines reaches the halfway mark.

item.title: US Steel Import Tariffs: CBAM Alignment Proposed
item.description: US DoE proposes carbon-intensity standards for imported construction steel to align with EU CBAM.

item.title: San Francisco: Transbay Tunnel Retrofit Finished
item.description: Seismic retrofitting of the BART Transbay Tube completed 6 months ahead of schedule.

item.title: Colombia: Bogota Metro Line 1 Viaduct Assembly
item.description: Giant gantry cranes begin assembling pre-cast concrete segments for the elevated metro.

item.title: Volvo CE Tests Hydrogen Hauler in Alaska
item.description: Volvo's prototype fuel-cell hauler undergoes extreme cold weather testing at a remote site.

item.title: EU Construction Products Regulation (CPR) Enforced
item.description: New mandate requires Digital Product Passports and GWP declarations for all EU construction materials.

item.title: Ukraine: 'Build Back Better' Conference Commitments
item.description: Donors pledge €5B specifically for reconstructing energy grid infrastructure using smart-grid standards.

item.title: UK HS2: Old Oak Common Station Roof Installation
item.description: The massive roof structure of the UK's largest new railway station is lifted into place.

item.title: Germany: Heat Pump Mandate for New Builds Live
item.description: The Building Energy Act amendment banning new gas boilers in new developments takes full effect.

item.title: France: Nuclear Reactor 'Penly' Site Prep
item.description: EDF begins large-scale earthworks for the first pair of new EPR2 reactors at Penly.

item.title: Sweden: Northvolt Skellefteå Expansion Paused
item.description: Construction on the "Northvolt Ett" expansion is halted amid slowing European EV demand.

item.title: Spain: Sagrada Familia Jesus Tower Final Phase
item.description: The final vertical construction phase of the central tower begins, targeting completion for the Gaudí centenary.

item.title: Poland: CPK Airport Master Plan Approved
item.description: The Polish government signs off on the final design for the Solidarity Transport Hub mega-airport.

item.title: Liebherr Unveils Hydrogen Excavator R 9XX H2
item.description: Liebherr launches its first mass-production hydrogen combustion crawler excavator for the EU market.

item.title: Italy: Messina Bridge Consortium Reconstituted
item.description: Webuild leads the re-formed consortium to update technical designs for the Strait of Messina bridge.

item.title: UK Insolvencies Rise 10% in Construction
item.description: High interest rates drive a spike in contractor failures in January, impacting housing starts.

item.title: Finland: Olkiluoto Deep Geological Repository Sealed
item.description: Posiva begins the operational trial for sealing spent nuclear fuel in the world's first deep repository.

item.title: Netherlands: Nitrogen Rules Ease for Housing
item.description: Dutch government relaxes nitrogen emissions permits specifically for affordable housing projects.

item.title: Turkey: Istanbul Canal Bridge Construction
item.description: Foundations laid for the second bridge crossing the planned Canal Istanbul route.

item.title: BIM Mandate: Germany Requires BIM for Public Rail
item.description: Deutsche Bahn makes BIM Level 2 mandatory for all rail infrastructure tenders over €5M.

item.title: Paris Metro Line 15 South: Testing Begins
item.description: First automated trains run on the completed southern section of the Grand Paris Express.

item.title: Norway: Ship Tunnel Project Financing Secured
item.description: Parliament approves updated budget for the Stad Ship Tunnel, allowing blasting to start in summer.

item.title: Heidelberg Materials: Carbon Capture Plant Retrofit
item.description: Construction begins on the LEILAC-2 carbon capture retrofit at the Hannover cement plant.

item.title: Greece: Ellinikon Smart City Tower Topped Out
item.description: The Riviera Tower, Greece's first skyscraper, reaches full structural height at the Ellinikon site.

item.title: Ireland: Metrolink Dublin Planning Granted
item.description: An Bord Pleanála grants the Railway Order for Dublin's Metrolink, clearing the way for procurement.

item.title: Guinea: Simandou Rail & Port Construction Peak
item.description: Simandou project enters peak construction with 15,000 workers on the 600km rail corridor.

item.title: DRC: Kamoa-Kakula Phase 4 Expansion
item.description: Civil works begin for the Phase 4 concentrator, aiming for 2027 commissioning.

item.title: Lobito Corridor: Angola-Zambia Rail Link Funded
item.description: US and EU financing confirmed for the greenfield rail link connecting Zambia to the Lobito line.

item.title: Kenya: Affordable Housing Levy Suits Dismissed
item.description: Courts clear the way for collecting the housing levy, restarting stalled Nairobi projects.

item.title: Egypt: New Capital Monorail Trial Runs
item.description: Full speed trial runs commence on the East Nile Monorail line connecting Cairo to the NAC.

item.title: Nigeria: Lagos-Calabar Highway 40% Complete
item.description: Section 1 of the coastal highway reaches 40% completion using rigid concrete pavement.

item.title: Morocco: Desalination Plant Construction Casablanca
item.description: Acciona begins pouring concrete for Africa's largest desalination plant in Casablanca.

item.title: Tanzania: SGR Railway Trials to Dodoma
item.description: Electric train trials successfully reach the capital Dodoma on the Standard Gauge Railway.

item.title: South Africa: Koeberg Nuclear Life Extension Work
item.description: Steam generator replacement on Unit 2 begins, critical for the plant's 20-year life extension.

item.title: Ethiopia: Grand Renaissance Dam Final Filling Prep
item.description: Construction of the final saddle dam height is completed ahead of the next rainy season.

item.title: Ghana: Tema Oil Refinery Upgrade Contract
item.description: Sentuo Oil signs deal to rehabilitate and expand the aging Tema refinery infrastructure.

item.title: Senegal: Dakar Bus Rapid Transit Full Ops
item.description: The all-electric BRT system in Dakar enters full commercial operation after pilot success.

item.title: Rwanda: Kigali Green City Construction Start
item.description: Groundbreaking for the first 600 units of the sustainable, affordable housing pilot.

item.title: Namibia: Green Hydrogen Village Infrastructure
item.description: Road and water access construction begins for the massive Hyphen Hydrogen project.

item.title: Zimbabwe: Steel Plant Blast Furnace Commissioned
item.description: The Manhize steel plant commissions its first blast furnace, aiming to supply regional construction.

item.title: Saudi Neom: 'The Line' Piling Contracts Awarded
item.description: Three new piling contracts awarded for the next 2km module of the linear city.

item.title: India: Arunachal Frontier Highway Construction
item.description: Strategic road construction begins along the border, aiming for all-weather connectivity.

item.title: Vietnam: North-South HSR Funding Approved
item.description: National Assembly approves initial capital for the $67B high-speed rail project.

item.title: Japan: Expo 2025 Construction Delays
item.description: Labor shortages delay pavilion construction; organizers request overtime cap exemptions.

item.title: Dubai Metro Blue Line: Main Contracts Signed
item.description: RTA awards design-build contracts for the 30km metro extension.

item.title: Indonesia: Nusantara Capital Government Core Complete
item.description: Construction of the Presidential Palace and key ministry buildings in the new capital is declared complete.

item.title: India: Data Center Tax Holiday Announced
item.description: Budget 2026 includes a tax holiday for foreign data center construction to boost digital infra.

item.title: Hyundai Robotics: Construction Robot Pilot at CES
item.description: Hyundai reveals "X-Site" autonomous patrol robots for construction site safety monitoring.

item.title: Singapore: Tuas Port Phase 2 Reclamation
item.description: Land reclamation for the second phase of the mega-port reaches 80% completion.

item.title: Philippines: Metro Manila Subway TBM Launch
item.description: Two new Tunnel Boring Machines launch from the Ortigas North station site.

item.title: Thailand: Land Bridge Roadshow Begins
item.description: Thai government kicks off investor roadshow for the $28B Chumphon-Ranong land bridge project.

item.title: South Korea: Floating City Busan Prototype
item.description: Assembly begins on the first modular platform of the Oceanix floating city pilot.

item.title: Qatar: North Field Expansion LNG Trains
item.description: Construction of the four massive LNG mega-trains reaches 50% overall completion.

item.title: China: Beijing-Shanghai Second HSR Line
item.description: Construction officially starts on the Weifang-Suqian section of the second high-speed rail corridor.

item.title: Taiwan: TSMC Kaohsiung Fab 2nm Tool-In
item.description: First EUV lithography tools moved into the new 2nm fab in Kaohsiung.

item.title: CMiC Report: 65% of Projects Now Use BIM
item.description: Report finds BIM is now the global baseline; AI energy management cuts usage by 15-30%.

item.title: Bentley Systems Acquires Pointivo
item.description: Bentley integrates Pointivo's drone AI analytics into its iTwin digital twin platform.

item.title: Pointorama Launches AI Floorplan Generator
item.description: New tool converts 3D point clouds to CAD floorplans automatically in minutes.

item.title: ISO 19650-6: New H&S BIM Standard Published
item.description: New international standard released for integrating Health & Safety data into BIM models.

item.title: Trimble Releases SiteVision 2026 AR Update
item.description: Update adds centimeter-accuracy underground utility visualization using new GNSS receivers.

item.title: Australia: Sydney Metro West Tunnels Complete
item.description: TBMs finish the final leg of tunneling between Parramatta and Sydney CBD.

item.title: Brazil: Angra 3 Nuclear Plant Work Resumes
item.description: Civil construction resumes on the stalled nuclear reactor after new tariff agreement.

item.title: Canada: Trans Mountain Pipeline Final Restoration
item.description: Final environmental reclamation work completed along the BC interior corridor.

item.title: Mexico: Tulum Airport Terminal 2 Design
item.description: Plans unveiled for a second terminal to handle unexpected tourist volume.

item.title: UK: Sizewell C Nuclear Sea Defence Work
item.description: Construction begins on the permanent sea defences protecting the future nuclear site.

item.title: Egypt: El Dabaa Nuclear Plant Unit 4 Concrete
item.description: First concrete poured for the reactor basemat of the fourth and final VVER unit.

item.title: Japan: Maglev Shinkansen Tunnel Breakthrough
item.description: Breakthrough achieved on the Southern Alps tunnel, the most difficult section of the line.

item.title: USA: Intel Ohio Fab Equipment Install
item.description: ASML lithography scanners arrive at the Columbus site as construction shifts to fit-out.

item.title: Canada: Yellowknife Airport Runway Paving
item.description: Winter work continues on runway expansion using specialized cold-weather asphalt.

item.title: Chile: Santiago Metro Line 7 Excavation
item.description: Excavation of the main station caverns reaches 60% completion.

item.title: Germany: Fehmarnbelt Tunnel Element Casting
item.description: Factory casting of the standard tunnel elements ramps up to full production speed.

item.title: Morocco: Kenitra Atlantic Port Breakwater
item.description: Main breakwater construction reaches 1km mark, protecting the future deepwater port.

item.title: India: Mumbai Coastal Road North Extension
item.description: Tenders invited for the Versova-Dahisar extension of the coastal road project.

item.title: USA: Texas High Speed Rail Land Acquisition
item.description: Amtrak and Texas Central secure 60% of land parcels needed for the Dallas-Houston route.

item.title: Canada: Pickering Nuclear Refurbishment Feasibility
item.description: OPG submits final feasibility report for refurbishing Pickering B units to the province.

item.title: Quebec: Tramway de Quebec Procurement Restart
item.description: CDPQ Infra relaunches procurement for the rolling stock of the revised Quebec City tramway.

item.title: Brazil: Salvador-Itaparica Bridge Dredging
item.description: Dredging works begin for the pillars of the longest overwater bridge in Latin America.

item.title: France: Lyon-Turin Tunnel Blasting
item.description: Blasting operations commence on the French side of the base tunnel.

item.title: Kenya: Nairobi Railway City Groundbreaking
item.description: President Ruto launches construction of the central station precinct in the Railway City project.

item.title: China: Shenzhen-Zhongshan Link Traffic Data
item.description: Traffic volume exceeds forecasts on the newly opened cross-sea link.

item.title: USA: Boston Commonwealth Pier Revitalization
item.description: Historic revitalization of Commonwealth Pier completes structural reinforcement phase.

item.title: Canada: Calgary Green Line LRT Utility Works
item.description: Major utility relocation begins in the Beltline for the underground LRT segment.

item.title: Tech: Canvas Launches New Drywall Robot
item.description: Robotics firm Canvas releases a smaller, lighter drywall finishing robot for residential use.

item.title: Tech: Procore Adds AI Estimating Module
item.description: Procore platform update includes generative AI for automated takeoff from PDF drawings.

item.title: Tech: Hilti Jaibot 2.0 Released
item.description: Updated drilling robot features improved autonomy and ceiling navigation.

item.title: Regulation: UK Building Safety Act Gate 2 Enforcement
item.description: Building Safety Regulator begins strict stop-work enforcement for high-rises lacking Gate 2 approval.

item.title: Regulation: NYC Local Law 97 Fine Period Begins
item.description: First round of fines issued to buildings exceeding 2025 carbon caps.

item.title: Regulation: BC Step Code Level 4 Mandate
item.description: Most new construction in British Columbia must now meet Step 4 efficiency standards (Net Zero Ready).

item.title: Tech: Dusty Robotics FieldPrinter 3 Launch
item.description: New version of the layout robot prints mechanical, electrical, and plumbing details simultaneously.

item.title: Tech: OpenSpace AI 360 Video Update
item.description: OpenSpace introduces "Pathfinder," allowing automated progress tracking from passive video capture.

item.title: Quebec: Arvida Bridge Replacement Award
item.description: Contract awarded for the aluminum bridge replacement in Saguenay, preserving heritage elements.

item.title: Canada: Darlington SMR Site Prep Complete
item.description: Site preparation for North America's first SMR at Darlington is officially finished; nuclear construction pending.

item.title: USA: Brightline West Las Vegas Station
item.description: Vertical construction begins on the flagship high-speed rail station in Las Vegas.

item.title: Brazil: Sao Paulo Metro Line 6 Tunneling
item.description: TBM "Tatuzão" reaches the future Perdizes station on the Orange Line.

item.title: Europe: Brenner Base Tunnel Breakthrough
item.description: Major breakthrough connecting the Austrian and Italian sides of the explorer tunnel.

item.title: Africa: Mphanda Nkuwa Dam Strategic Partner
item.description: Mozambique selects consortium to build the $4.5B hydropower dam on the Zambezi.

item.title: Asia: Johor Bahru-Singapore RTS Link Marine Viaduct
item.description: Marine viaduct span connecting Malaysia and Singapore is structurally complete.

item.title: Canada: Confederation Line East Extension Track
item.description: Rail installation reaches the future Place d'Orléans station.
